entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of wet flurries inland overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
